name: sky-plate
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Flying moves by 20%. Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder’s type becomes Flying.
short_effect: Held: Flying-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus’s and Judgment’s type to Flying.

flavor_text.x_y: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a stone tablet that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.
